title: RECENTLY RENOVATED - INMAN SQUARE - 2 Bed - SEE VIDEO!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 40590470', 'Rent: $2,850 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/15/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Recently Updated - Click link below for virtual tour!', 'https://kuula.co/share/collection/7YVpq?logo=0&info=0&fs=1&vr=1&sd=1&initload=0&thumbs=1', 'Recently renovated 2 bedroom unit walking distance to Inman Square in Cambridge.', 'Great location for Harvard, MIT or commuters to downtown Boston.', 'Available NOW, 8/1, 8/15, or 9/1   --  Newly renovated top floor, 2BR apartment featuring a remodeled kitchen with soft-close shaker cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances.', 'Also boasts a new high-efficiency combination washer/dryer in unit as well as an updated bathroom with a tiled bathtub surround.', 'Other updates include refinished hardwood floors, upgraded LED lighting, and new paint throughout.', 'Primary HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED - Laundry in building.', 'Close to the Red Line, Kendall, MIT, and much more.', 'Bus: 68 Broadway @', 'Windsor St (0.40 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Columbia St @ Cambridge St (0.13 mi)', 'Bus: 83 Prospect St @ Gardner Rd (0.42 mi)', 'Bus: 69 Cambridge St @ Windsor St (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 87 McGrath Hwy @', 'Medford St (0.36 mi)', 'Bus: 91 Newton St @ Webster Ave (0.42 mi)', 'Bus: CT2 30 Prospect St (0.43 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Washington St @ Merriam St (0.48 mi)', '40590470', 'FEATURES', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry', 'Vacant', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
